Package org.apache.xalan.xslt.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    XslTransformEvaluationHelper
    This class, defines few utility methods, that provide support for Xalan-J's XSL 3 transformation processor implementation.
    XslTransformSharedDatastore
    A class definition, that has few XSL stylesheet transformation wide variables that are used while evaluating specific XSL stylesheet instructions and XPath expressions.
